Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackEnd
    BackEnd is the class in which the current state of the FSM implemented through the pattern state is decided
    BuildState
    BuildState is a class part of the FSM of the controller.
    CharonSwitchState
    CharonSwitchState is the class that represents the status of the FSM in which used for the special power of Charon, the current worker exchanges his position with the opponent's position.
    ChooseWorkerState
    ChooseWorkerState is the class that represents the status of the FSM in which the current player chooses the worker to play with
    MoveState
    MoveState is the class that represents the state of the FSM in which the current worker execute his move
    PlaceWorkersState
    PlaceWorkerState is a class that represents the state of the FSM in which the current player places his workers
    PrometheusBuildState
    A GameState made for Prometheus in order to make a build and then move his worker without moving up
    PrometheusMoveState
    A GameState which follows the PrometheusBuildState in order to make Prometheus use his power
    RemovePlayerState
    A GameState which performs the remove of a player from the game
    SetPlayersState
    SetPlayerState is the initial GameState, it receives the name and gods of the players and creates a game table
    WinState
    A GameState that ends the match
